definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes

sentences.english: Once again, close adaptation of the denture base to the mucosa will enhance these forces.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，基託與粘膜間良好的密合性可增強表面張力。

sentences.english: The liquid surface tension coefficient was measured by si-resistance-strain sensor.
sentences.chinese: 利用硅壓阻式力敏傳感器測量液體表面張力系數。

sentences.english: Surface tension of LiBr solution with surfactants was measured by Wilhelmy plate method.
sentences.chinese: 採用吊板法測量溶液的表面張力。

sentences.english: The interfacial tension of the acquired dispersions was lower than that of deionized water.
sentences.chinese: 兩類預聚物水分散系的表面張力均遠小於純水。

sentences.english: The chemicals are designed to reduce the surface tension of the remaining oil and to push it toward a producing well.
sentences.chinese: 化學劑用來降低剩餘油的表面張力並將油推向生產井。

sentences.english: The effects of adsorbate on moduli and surface stress of the diamond thin films were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 探討了吸附物對金剛石模量或表面張力的影響。

sentences.english: Plating solution surface tension is too large, wetting agents insufficient.
sentences.chinese: 電鍍溶液表面張力過大，溼潤劑不足。

sentences.english: The thermocapillary and buoyancy driven flow are included in the solution of momentum equations.
sentences.chinese: 動量方程求解中考慮了熱表面張力與浮力聯合驅動流。

sentences.english: So for the water to be ejected from the fur, the centripetal force has to exceed the surface tension.
sentences.chinese: 所以，要讓水從皮毛彈出，向心力必須超過表面張力。

sentences.english: Surface tension is one of the important control parameters of the ceramic squeegee oil .
sentences.chinese: 表面張力的控制是陶瓷印油產品的主要控制指標之一。

sentences.english: This proved that the surface tension causes free surface returning to equilibrium location.
sentences.chinese: 說明表面張力具有使得自由面返回到平衡位置的作用。

sentences.english: Low surface tension also helps bubbles grow quickly.
sentences.chinese: 弱小的表面張力也促使了泡泡增長速度變快。

sentences.english: The methods used are the sessile and pendant drop tensiometry.
sentences.chinese: 表面張力之量測乃使用固著液滴和懸垂液滴兩種方法。

sentences.english: Varying surface tension leads to tangential forces along the interface. This is often called the Marangoni effect.
sentences.chinese: 表面張力之量測乃使用固著液滴和懸垂液滴兩種方法。
